1123.content: Okay, how else to gain?
1123.title: other Reasons for her to gain?

choices: haven't training in a month, better do that first
11231.content:
It was a hot morning and Hinata slept in late. To be honest with you, there hadn't been anything to do, and today wasn't going to be any different. Kurenai's pregnancy meant she was gone and she didn't have any reason to train, Naruto was constantly training, and there was nothing else to really do. She barely even got dressed anymore.

Hinata finally slid out of bed and sat up, mumbling. Her night shirt was warm from being wrapped up around her all night, and she held tightly to it. The only problem was it left a draft above her knees, a problem that got worse and worse every week it seemed.

She dragged her self across the room and looked at the clock, five in the evening. She then used her byakugan and saw that no one was there. No reason to get dressed. She walked down the stairs and grabbed something to eat. She sat back in the wooden chair, munching on a few rice balls. She hadn't even noticed a small bump over her stomach she had never had before. After only two she figured she should visit Kurenai, who had a month left to her pregnancy. She got up and went to get dressed.

Back in her room she put on her jeans, which had gotten extremely tight over the past few weeks, and she hadn't worn it enough to notice. She laid down with her back against the floor, tossing her legs up in the air, yanking on the zipper until it closed. Next came the bra, just as bad. She let out as big of a breathe as possible and squeezed, finally getting it on. Then the tank top, which just barely reached her tiny naval. Finally she slipped into her jacket, which felt snug but hid her weight well. She looked at herself in the mirror real fast, her features starting to soften from her unnoticed gain as she combed her hair and headed out.
11231.title: Getting Lazy

11232.content: How adult hinata going to get fatter?
11232.title: Something else

112321.content:
Hinata groaned as she awoke. She tried to move her hands and feet, but soon realized that they were held down. It was dark and a little warm, and she could feel the air on her naked body.. She was frightened to realize that she couldn't activate her Byakugan. She tried to remember what she had done to come to this place, but it all came up black. She had gone home after a long day of training and fell asleep.

Suddenly, a light came on, and she could see that she was in a room with stone walls. She was in a bed, there was a chair beside her, a desk across the room. Beside the door was...
112321.title: Force Feed

choices: Hinata finds that she likes this idea
1123211.content:
"N-N-Naruto?"

Her crush was standing there, a smile on his face, a grocery bag in his hand.

"How are you feeling, Hina-chan?"

She blushed and felt very faint as she realized that he could see her, all of her spread out. She wanted to scream, but found her voice just wouldn't work.

"It's okay, Hina-chan," he sounded so calm. He walk to the chair and sat down before rummaging in the plastic bag. "I know it's scary, but it's for the best. I just want what's good for you."

"B-But-"

"Shhh, you don't have to think anymore, Hinata."

He stroked her hair. Even though she was embarrassed and scared, she leaned into his gentle touch. She felt disappointed when he took his hand away.

"See? This won't be so bad, maybe it will be a little fun?"

"B-But w-w-what a-a-are y-you doing?"

He smiled his bright smile as he finally found what he was looking for: a yogurt cup.

"Well, you see, I actually think you're really cute, but you could be cuter. I love fat girls, and I just couldn't get the idea of you out of my head. So I took you away from your crappy family so I could make you into my perfect fat girl."
1123211.title: Naruto...

122.content:
Tenten was at home in her kitchen she had just be put off active duty with her team. Ten ten apparently had contraced some disease that is immune to everything but the male chromosome. To make matters worse it was not that contagious and could only be caught by eating a specific type of food. Luckily it wasn't life threating but what worries her is the fact she caught sometime last week. She was on a mission with hinata and they ate all the same things meaning she also had it.
She went to her phone and dialed Shinzues office at the hospital too ask about any possible cures which was no luck. She would either have to get testoerone supplements or wiat the three months for the less drastic cure was done. Tenten sighed before asking herself exactly how did the ilness work.
122.title: It begins

1222.content:
Tenten's stomach growled as she realized she was hungry, Really hungry, Going to her frige she opened it up and suddenly had the urge to eat everything in there. She gave in and began eating it all Even the thirty puonds of cookie dough that little Ninja scout had tricked her into buying yesterday. Half way through devouring the contants of the tub tenten gained control her hand still near her mouth with a scoop of cookie dough. Eating it she put the tub back and closed the fridge not noticing her bloated stomach sticking out of her shirt. She looked to be about nine months pregnant with twins, as she sat down on her couch to watch tv absentmindently spreading her legs to allow her belly some free room.
Getting up several hours later most of the food digested Tenten walked to her room and put on her pj's and climbed into bed unaware that the fat was already forming.
1222.title: fatty hunger

Fatten up the Naruto girls in anyway you like
